content.p: We’re here to help current and prospective students with information, advice and support around all aspects of student funding. We can help with student loans, NHS bursaries and University funds. If you have ongoing money worries or short-term concerns, we offer confidential support to help you find the solutions to managing your money effectively. Students experiencing financial difficulties should refer to our support funds pages for details of the funds available. Funding and financial support Welfare support Everything you need to know is on our financial support webpages, from scholarship and bursary applications to managing your money. If you’d like to get in touch with a member of the Funding and Financial Support team please see our contact pages
